aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: I describe myself as a disciplined individual, always driven by the desire to learn and educate myself to solve problems using technology. I have assertive communication skills, as well as empathy, and I'm not afraid to ask questions when in doubt. I have knowledge in multiple technologies, with a focus on programming languages such as C#, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I work in .NET (Visual Studio) and Angular JS environments, and I have experience with various ORMs like EntityFramework, Sequelize, and Mongoose, as well as API development, layout, and application design.
